message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,300,000. This is a great deal for both of us. I'm confident this product will be very valuable to you. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am currently working within a budget and am unable to meet the $1,300,000 price point. Would you consider lowering the price to $1,200,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I appreciate your offer, $1,200,000 is still below my minimum price point.  I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000, but this is my final offer.  Let me know if you're able to meet this price, otherwise I'll need to explore other options.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed my budget and I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,225,000. This is the highest amount I can afford at this time. I hope we can reach an agreement.
